review: Oh boy! i love this game! I fixed the only error that wasn't letting me play! good game :)

Have you ever tought to yourself 'Man, if only there was a game that was not p2w and fun to play with  my friends', well, this game is for you then! its full of fun and the connection is good, i never tought a free to play game could be soo fun10/10!
Would think this game was about crushing castles again10/10
Its boring when you dont have addons, but with addons... This game is a paradise :D Totally recomended for bored ppl
